reviews.title: Japanese "foreigner friendly" Ryokans in Hakone
reviews.text: If you are in Tokyo and want to get anway from the city plan a trip to Hakone, just 90 minutes away by the fast "Romance Car" from Shinjuku station. Buy a free pass and you`ll be fine to ride every public transportation in Hakone area.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I go to Hakone very frequently and always stay in a Ryokan of the "Ichinoyu group", check their web page in English: http://english.ichinoyu.co.jp/index.html
reviews.title: Good Value in Hakone
This is a great great place. What an experience!
reviews.text: Last time I`ve treid the one located in Gora as I never stayed in that area. As all Ichinoyu Hotels this one was nice as well, good serice and quality for the price you pay, clean facilities, delicious food. Only minus: when you travel by yourself certain rooms with private outdoor baths are either not bookable or you`ll end up paying a price based on double occupancy. Therefor this time I could only stay in a "western stlye" room, which was huge and nice. In other Ichinoyu ones I have been able to stay in "Japanese style tatami rooms", very traditional and for sure smething you should do when you are in Japan for holidays or if you life here and get visitors. Everybody loves it!

Great location as the Hotel was very nearby to Gora station about 10-15minutes walk. With a total of only 10 rooms, it was quiet and peaceful even when fully occupied. We booked a room with private open0air bath on the 2nd floor and it was perfect! We were surprised by size of the room as we expected a smaller one but instead it was sizeable and comfortable for even a whole family of 4. Dinner and breakfast was very good and very filling. Most importantly we really enjoyed our ryokan experience here!
reviews.title: A Really enjoyable and memorable stay

reviews.text: Hotel is located close to the Gora cable car station, hence making it very convenient.
reviews.title: Simply Great

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a little inn with not many rooms. We stayed on the ground floor Japanese room with a outdoor onsen tub. During our stay, the place was quiet and peaceful.
reviews.title: Great location, clean room

reviews.text: Dinner and breakfast were good along with the service.
reviews.title: Enjoyed my stay tremendously

reviews.text: Our family had a great time here and will recommend this place to anyone looking to chill out at this beautiful ryokan.
